channel.title: CVE Feed for Livemesh -- Livemesh Addons for Beaver Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Livemesh -- Livemesh Addons for Beaver Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-38784|2024-08-02T04:19:20.293Z -- livemesh -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Beaver Builder: from n/a through 3.6.1.
